EmailTemplate.description: When a case is opened, this email is sent to the partner
EmailTemplate.name: Partner Support Case Open
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for Submitting a Case with BlueWave Partner Support
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|MC:SUBJECT|*
Hello {!Case.SuppliedName},
Thank you for submitting a case with BlueWave Partner Support. Case #{!Case.CaseNumber} is being evaluated and the most appropriate representative is being assigned to fix this issue. You should expect a response to your inquiry within two business days. Thanks for joining us to make ‘Solar for the 100%' not just a mission, but a reality. - All of us here at BlueWave P.S. If you have any questions, please feel free to contact us at partnersupport@bluewavesolar.com or (888) 817-2703. We’re happy to help.
